attributes.additional_details: Charge-backs are crippling small businesses. The banks should stand the cost, They authorise the  transactions and say it's okay!  We sell the goods and then only later the bank tells us it's fraudulent and the bank takes the money back of us! This is no way to rebuild an economy, we are the life blood of the economy and we are being penalised for no fault of our own. Sign up and help stop this!
